message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. This is a competitive price considering its value to you is $12000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $16000. This is still a good deal considering its value to you is $12000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $15500. Can you consider that?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $16250. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering its value to you is $12000.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $15750. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $16500. This is the last concession I'm willing to make.

I understand that you're getting close to your minimum acceptable price, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $15750. Can you consider meeting me halfway between your last offer and my previous counteroffer?
I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to meet you halfway at this point. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $16300. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $15750. I'm going to have to pass on this deal and explore other options. Thank you for your time and consideration.
